729744f-a.title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - New York Avenue
729744f-a.text:
(1)
Todt Hill Road, east side, between New York Avenue and
Merrick Avenue, showing the old J. Hankey House. The atlases
from 1874 to 1907 show it to have belonged to the above family.
In 1917 it was on the propety of Edward W. brown. At the time
of these photographs the estate was being taken over by the Country
Day School of the Staten Island Academy.
A ;ust e, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
The same, another vlew.
August 4, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REIRCDU:TIONS

729742f-b.text:

729741f-b.title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - New York Avenue
729741f-b.text:
(1) Todt Hill Road, east side, between New York Avenue and
Merrick Avenue, showing the J. Eankey house. The real estate
atlases from 1874 to 1907 show it to have belomged to the above
family. It was on the property of Edward W. Brown, in 1917.
This is the south side of the house.
Novewber 18, 1910
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2) The J. Hankey Nouse, twenty-two years later,when the property
was taken over by The Country Pay School of the Staten Island Academy.
Sugust 4,1932
P.L.Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
